item.title: 受谢因、特穆欢迎的免关税货运遭遇美国海关障碍
item.description: 业内专家说，美国对处理来自与中国有关联的申银万国和特木网等巨头的数十亿美元廉价网上购物订单的报关行实施了新的打击，这很可能会造成交货延误和瓶颈。【原文：A new U.S. crackdown on customs brokers handling billions of dollars in inexpensive online shopping orders from giants like China-linked Shein and Temu is likely to cause delivery delays and bottlenecks, industry experts said.】

item.title: 英伟达的惊人涨幅日益推动华尔街创纪录的增长
item.description: 推动美国股市创下历史新高的涨势越来越依赖于炙手可热的芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）和其他几只巨型股票，这重新引发了人们对市场表现已与几家公司捆绑在一起的担忧。【原文：A rally that has propelled U.S. equities to record highs increasingly rests on red-hot chipmaker Nvidia and a handful of other giant stocks, reviving concerns that the market’s performance has become tied to a cluster of companies.】

item.title: Meta 因使用个人数据训练人工智能模型而收到 11 起欧盟投诉
item.description: Meta Platforms 周四遭到 11 起投诉，原因是该公司提出的修改方案将在未征得同意的情况下使用个人数据训练其人工智能模型，这可能违反了欧盟的隐私规则。【原文：Meta Platforms was hit with 11 complaints on Thursday over proposed changes that would see it use personal data to train its artificial intelligence models without asking for consent, which may breach European Union privacy rules.】

item.title: 消息人士称，亿万富翁李泽楷的 FWD 集团重启香港上市计划
item.description: 亿万富翁李泽楷重启了泛亚保险公司富登集团在香港上市的计划，三位直接了解此事的人士表示，此前富登集团上市的尝试因监管延迟和市场波动而受挫。【原文：Billionaire Richard Li has revived plans to list pan-Asian insurer FWD Group in Hong Kong, said three people with direct knowledge of the matter, after regulatory delay and market volatility scuppered previous attempts to take it public.】

item.title: 碧桂园香港清盘聆讯进一步延期至七月
item.description: 陷入困境的碧桂园在周四提交的一份文件中称，香港高等法院已将寻求对这家中国房地产开发商进行清算的呈请聆讯进一步延期至 7 月 29 日。【原文：Embattled Country Garden said in a filing on Thursday the Hong Kong High Court had further adjourned a hearing of a petition seeking liquidation of the Chinese property developer to July 29.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，美国监管机构将对微软、OpenAI 和 Nvidia 展开反垄断调查
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部和联邦贸易委员会已达成协议，允许他们对微软、OpenAI 和 Nvidia 在人工智能产业中的主导地位展开反垄断调查。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department and the Federal Trade Commission have reached a deal that allows them to proceed with antitrust investigations into the dominant roles that Microsoft , OpenAI and Nvidia play in the artificial intelligence industry, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间竞标E-C-B 的时间到了
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席称，美国以太坊 ETF 的推出时间取决于发行商的行动速度
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）周三表示，与加密货币以太坊挂钩的交易所交易基金（ETF）何时能开始交易，主要取决于发行商对美国证券交易委员会的询问做出回应的速度。【原文：The timing for when exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the cryptocurrency ether can begin trading depends largely on how quickly issuers respond to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's queries, Chair Gary Gensler said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 报告称，美国太阳能发电装机量创季度纪录，占新增发电量的 75
item.description: 伍德麦肯兹公司（Wood Mackenzie）和太阳能产业协会（Solar Energy Industries Association）周四发布的一份报告显示，随着太阳能电池板的安装量创下季度记录，今年年初美国电网新增发电能力中的75%来自太阳能。【原文：Solar accounted for 75% of electricity generation capacity added to the U.S. power grid early this year as installations of panels rose to a quarterly record, according to a report published by Wood Mackenzie and the Solar Energy Industries Association on Thursday.】

item.title: 降息押注蓄势待发，亚洲股市反弹；欧洲央行成为焦点
item.description: 亚洲股市周四上涨，原因是市场对美国联邦储备委员会可能在 9 月份降息的预期不断升温，而欧元在欧洲央行政策会议召开前走高，市场普遍预期欧洲央行将降息。【原文：Asian shares gained on Thursday on rising expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve will likely cut interest rates in September, while the euro advanced ahead of the European Central Bank policy meeting where a rate cut is widely expected.】

item.title: 美国称 KKR、GIP 和印度太平洋集团成立 250 亿美元地区基础设施合作公司
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周四表示，私募股权公司KKR和全球基础设施合作伙伴（GIP）与新成立的印度-太平洋繁荣伙伴组织正在组建一个联盟，将向该地区的基础设施投资250亿美元。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Thursday that private equity firms KKR and Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) and the newly formed Indo-Pacific Partnership for Prosperity were forming a coalition to invest $25 billion in infrastructure in the region.】

item.title: 日本央行中村警告称日本可能无法实现 2025 年后的物价目标
item.description: 日本鸽派决策者中村丰明（Toyoaki Nakamura）周四表示，如果消费停滞不前，明年日本的通胀率可能达不到央行设定的2%的目标，这凸显了进一步加息时机的不确定性。【原文：Japan may see inflation fall short of the central bank's 2% target next year if consumption stagnates, its dovish policymaker Toyoaki Nakamura said on Thursday, highlighting uncertainty over the timing of further interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 欧洲央行决议前欧元持稳，美元下跌
item.description: 周四，在欧洲中央银行（ECB）做出政策决定之前，欧元略微走强，交易员认为欧洲中央银行几乎肯定会降息，而美元则因再次押注美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）今年有望进入宽松周期而有所回落。【原文：The euro firmed a touch on Thursday ahead of a policy decision from the European Central Bank (ECB) where traders consider a rate cut all but certain, while the dollar eased on renewed bets of a U.S. Federal Reserve easing cycle expected this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月贸易顺差反弹，进口大幅下降
item.description: 周四的数据显示，澳大利亚 4 月份的货物贸易顺差出现反弹，原因是进口在连续数月增长后出现下滑，尽管铁和煤的出口也出现疲软。【原文：Australia's surplus on trade goods rebounded in April as imports took a dive after several months of gains, though exports of iron and coal also softened, data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储降息预期增强，石油上涨
item.description: 石油在周四亚洲早盘交易中上涨，原因是市场对美联储将在9月份降息的预期不断升温，而且市场从与美国库存增加和欧佩克+计划增加供应有关的大跌中反弹。【原文：Oil rose in early Asian trading on Thursday on rising expectations the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in September, and as the market rebounded from a selloff related to growing U.S. inventories and an OPEC+ plan to increase supply.】

item.title: 好市多的日本工资为改善日本低工资和经济状况提供了途径
item.description: 去年，好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）在离东京不远的一个日本农村小镇开设了仓库，提供了数百个薪水令人瞠目的工作岗位，附近的一家面条连锁店采取了一个激进的措施：将小时工资提高了三分之一。【原文：When Costco Wholesale opened its warehouse in a rural Japanese town not far from Tokyo last year offering hundreds of jobs at eye-popping pay, a nearby noodle shop chain took a drastic step: it hiked hourly wages by a third.】

item.title: 据《时尚商业》报道，香奈儿创意总监维吉妮-维阿尔（Virginie Viard）将退出香奈儿品牌
item.description: 据时尚新闻网站 Business of Fashion 周三报道，奢侈时尚品牌香奈儿的创意总监 Virginie Viard 即将离职。【原文：Luxury fashion brand Chanel's creative director Virginie Viard is set to leave the company, fashion news website Business of Fashion reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 聚焦：诺和诺德在中国应对Ozempic和Wegovy的仿制药挑战
item.description: 临床试验记录显示，诺和诺德公司在前景广阔的中国市场面临着竞争加剧的前景，制药商正在中国开发至少15种糖尿病药物Ozempic和减肥药Wegovy的仿制药。【原文：Novo Nordisk is facing the prospect of intensifying competition in the promising Chinese market where drugmakers are developing at least 15 generic versions of its diabetes drug Ozempic and weight loss treatment Wegovy, clinical trial records showed.】

item.title: 早间竞标：市场回暖，中国贸易也回暖？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 巴菲特的 NetJets 公司起诉飞行员工会诽谤
item.description: 亿万富翁沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc）旗下的豪华飞机公司 NetJets 控告其拥有 3,400 名会员的飞行员工会诽谤该公司在安全和飞行员培训方面的承诺。【原文：NetJets, the luxury plane unit of billionaire Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc , sued its 3,400-member pilots union for defamation over statements about its commitment to safety and training pilots.】

item.title: 美国将纽约最低飞行要求的削减期限延长至 2025 年底
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）周三表示，以空中交通管制员人手短缺为由，再次将纽约市地区拥挤机场最低飞行要求的削减期限延长至 2025 年 10 月。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) said on Wednesday it is again extending cuts to minimum flight requirements at congested New York City-area airports through October 2025, citing air traffic controller staffing shortages.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席称，美国以太坊 ETF 的推出时间取决于发行商的行动速度
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）周三表示，与加密货币以太坊挂钩的交易所交易基金（ETF）何时能开始交易，主要取决于发行商对美国证券交易委员会的询问做出回应的速度。【原文：The timing for when exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the cryptocurrency ether can begin trading depends largely on how quickly issuers respond to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's queries, Chair Gary Gensler said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 电信公司寻求阻止美国恢复网络中立规则
item.description: 电信行业组织正试图阻止拜登政府恢复定于 7 月 22 日生效的具有里程碑意义的网络中立规则。【原文：Telecom industry groups are seeking to block the Biden administration's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules set to take effect on July 22.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 Zoox 公司将开始在奥斯汀和迈阿密测试机器人轴
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的自动驾驶汽车部门Zoox周三表示，它计划在奥斯汀和迈阿密开始测试其robotaxis，此举将标志着它在美国西部以外的第一个试验场地。【原文：Amazon.com's self-driving car unit Zoox said on Wednesday it plans to start testing its robotaxis in Austin and Miami, a move that will mark its first trial sites outside the western United States.】

item.title: Vanguard 表示支持埃克森董事会，但提出投资者权益问题
item.description: 先锋（Vanguard）表示，旗下基金支持埃克森公司在上周的年会上选举其提名的董事，但这家共同基金巨头表示，对该能源公司起诉气候活动人士的担忧挥之不去。【原文：Vanguard said its funds supported the election of Exxon's director nominees at its annual meeting last week, but the mutual fund giant cited lingering concerns about the energy company's lawsuit against climate activists.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官将于 6 月 18 日在美国参议院小组作证
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）将于6月18日在美国参议院小组会议上作证，此前发生的一系列事故引起了人们对安全和质量的担忧，监管机构禁止该飞机制造商扩大其最畅销的737 MAX的产量。【原文：Boeing CEO Dave Calhoun will testify before a U.S. Senate panel on June 18 after a series of incidents raised concerns about safety and quality and regulators barred the planemaker from expanding production of its best-selling 737 MAX.】

item.title: 软银支持的在线银行 Inter 在佛罗里达州向巴西人下注
item.description: 软银支持的巴西在线贷款公司 Inter & Co 希望在美国复制其在本土市场的成功，该公司首席执行官表示，它正在佛罗里达州最大的两个城市瞄准来自拉美最大国家的游客。【原文：SoftBank-backed Brazilian online lender Inter & Co is hoping to replicate its home market success in the United States, where it is targeting visitors from Latin America's largest country in two of Florida's biggest cities, the firm's chief executive said.】

item.title: 英伟达股票市值首次达到 3 万亿美元
item.description: 本周三，英伟达（Nvidia）的股票市值首次突破 3 万亿美元，因为这家芯片制造商从华尔街重量级企业争夺人工智能技术主导权的竞争中获益匪浅。【原文：Nvidia's stock market value hit $3 trillion for the first time on Wednesday as the chipmaker benefited from a race between Wall Street's heavyweights to dominate AI technology.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 今年在巴西的投资额将超过最初预测
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 巴西当地市场负责人 Fernando Yunes 周三表示，由于销售额高于预期，预计今年在巴西的投资将超过最初计划的 230 亿雷亚尔（约合 43.5 亿美元）。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre expects its investments in Brazil this year to exceed the 23 billion reais ($4.35 billion) initially planned due to higher-than-expected sales, local marketplace head Fernando Yunes said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国太保集团向巴西风电场投资 1.47 亿美元，并启动太阳能园项目
item.description: 中国电力公司 SPIC 周三宣布投资 7.8 亿雷亚尔（1.4741 亿美元）在巴西东北部建设两个新的风电场，同时首次进军巴西太阳能领域，两个大型园区已开始运营。【原文：Chinese electricity company SPIC announced on Wednesday a 780 million reais ($147.41 million) investment in construction of two new wind farms in Northeastern Brazil, while making its debut in the country's solar sector, with two large parks beginning operations.】
